attributes.action: Demand the Death Penalty for the 2 cowards that attacked an off duty Soldier with machetes
attributes.additional_details:
There is no punishment other than death that should be considered for the 2 cowards that today, 22/5/13, attacked and killed an off duty soldier in the streets with knives and machetes.
We demand that HMG commit these 2 murderers to be hung,
Terrorists must be made to pay the full and final penalty for there cowardly crimes.
